Payment_Request_API.summary: The Payment Request API provides a consistent user experience for merchants and users. It is not a new way of paying for things; instead, it's a way for users to select their preferred way of paying for things and make that information available to a merchant.

Payment_Request_APIUsing_the_Payment_Req.summary: The Payment Request API provides a browser-based method of connecting users and their preferred payment systems and platforms to merchants that they want to pay for goods and services. This article is a guide to making use of the Payment Request API, with examples and suggested best practices.
